string-array.name: descriptionLuxuryDishes
string-array.item: Overpriced avocado soup with cooked crab. Altough it is delicious it is pricy and hard to make. But the ingrediënts needed are: - Avocado - Salt - Pepper - Lobster - Maizena

Rolled beef with baked potatoes and smored vegetables. This delicious meal takes alot of time but is worth in the long end. Items needed to make this dish are: - Potatoes - Beef - Basel - Carrots - Salt - Pepper - Brocolli
Exotic coquilles with a light dressing. This dish is hard to master, but once done. Very delicious. Items needed are: - Scalps - Wine dressing - Basel - Bread - Salt - Pepper
Rich and delicious flavoured crab-soup. This soup is for whealthy people. If you make it. You will never want something else. Ingrediënts needed: - Juice of a crab - Cooked crab - Salt - Pepper

Soft and very good white fish. Served with asparagus and orange caviar. This expensive and delicious meal can be made with the following ingrediënts: - White fish - Asparagus - Salt - Pepper - Orange caviar eggs

Sweet and low fat rice with sauteded onions. This meal is for the master cooks. Master all cooking steps to make the perfect rice. Items needed for this great dish are: - Rice - Onions - Dressing - Basel - Bread
